body: "All indications are it promises to be a grand affair with an eclectic mix of creative offerings that are sure to appeal to literature fans from all over the world": Caribbean Book Blog is excited about the Bocas Lit Fest, while Iv치n's File Cabinet blogs about the Havana Book Festival.
